entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story. He is described as feeling a sudden jerk behind his navel.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is on either side of him during the event.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends who is on his left or right side during the event.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: A grown man who is waiting with others and counting down to an event.

relationships.description: Harry's forefinger is stuck to the boot as though it was pulling him magnetically onward.
Ron is on either side of Harry during the event.
Hermione is also on either side of Harry during the event.
Mr. Weasley and others are waiting with the boot in semidarkness.
